page.title: 05Employment
page.content: As stated in the introduction,most people are employed on the land and, of the working population totalling 109 in the two villages,46 people travel elsewhere to work. The table below shows the distances involved and the number of people who travel them: {Distance to Work No. of people. Up to 3 miles 14 4-10 " 15 11-20 " 12 Over 20 " 5 The question of employment is a very delicate one because in recent years there has been an enormous increase in unemployment not only in this country but in Europe and America because of a recession. Increased mechanization in farming has affected the two villages and small farms are a thing of the past.
